verses.plain: He that feareth the Lord will do good, and he that hath the knowledge of the law shall obtain her.

tokens.t: He that feareth the Lord will do good, and he that hath the knowledge of the law shall obtain her.

verses.plain: And as a mother shall she meet him, and receive him as a wife married of a virgin.

tokens.t: And as a mother shall she meet him, and receive him as a wife married of a virgin.

verses.plain: With the bread of understanding shall she feed him, and give him the water of wisdom to drink.

tokens.t: With the bread of understanding shall she feed him, and give him the water of wisdom to drink.

verses.plain: He shall be stayed upon her, and shall not be moved; and shall rely upon her, and shall not be confounded.

tokens.t: He shall be stayed upon her, and shall not be moved; and shall rely upon her, and shall not be confounded.

verses.plain: She shall exalt him above his neighbours, and in the midst of the congregation shall she open his mouth.

tokens.t: She shall exalt him above his neighbours, and in the midst of the congregation shall she open his mouth.

verses.plain: He shall find joy and a crown of gladness, and she shall cause him to inherit an everlasting name.

tokens.t: He shall find joy and a crown of gladness, and she shall cause him to inherit an everlasting name.

verses.plain: But foolish men shall not attain unto her, and sinners shall not see her.

tokens.t: But foolish men shall not attain unto her, and sinners shall not see her.

verses.plain: For she is far from pride, and men that are liars cannot remember her.

tokens.t: For she is far from pride, and men that are liars cannot remember her.

verses.plain: Praise is not seemly in the mouth of a sinner, for it was not sent him of the Lord.

tokens.t: Praise is not seemly in the mouth of a sinner, for it was not sent him of the Lord.

verses.plain: For praise shall be uttered in wisdom, and the Lord will prosper it.

tokens.t: For praise shall be uttered in wisdom, and the Lord will prosper it.

verses.plain: Say not thou, It is through the Lord that I fell away: for thou oughtest not to do the things that he hateth.

tokens.t: Say not thou, It is through the Lord that I fell away: for thou oughtest not to do the things that he hateth.

verses.plain: Say not thou, He hath caused me to err: for he hath no need of the sinful man.

tokens.t: Say not thou, He hath caused me to err: for he hath no need of the sinful man.

verses.plain: The Lord hateth all abomination; and they that fear God love it not.

tokens.t: The Lord hateth all abomination; and they that fear God love it not.

verses.plain: He himself made man from the beginning, and left him in the hand of his counsel;

tokens.t: He himself made man from the beginning, and left him in the hand of his counsel;

verses.plain: If thou wilt, to keep the commandments, and to perform acceptable faithfulness.

tokens.t: If thou wilt, to keep the commandments, and to perform acceptable faithfulness.

verses.plain: He hath set fire and water before thee: stretch forth thy hand unto whether thou wilt.

tokens.t: He hath set fire and water before thee: stretch forth thy hand unto whether thou wilt.

verses.plain: Before man is life and death; and whether him liketh shall be given him.

tokens.t: Before man is life and death; and whether him liketh shall be given him.

verses.plain: For the wisdom of the Lord is great, and he is mighty in power, and beholdeth all things:

tokens.t: For the wisdom of the Lord is great, and he is mighty in power, and beholdeth all things:

verses.plain: And his eyes are upon them that fear him, and he knoweth every work of man.

tokens.t: And his eyes are upon them that fear him, and he knoweth every work of man.

verses.plain: He hath commanded no man to do wickedly, neither hath he given any man licence to sin.

tokens.t: He hath commanded no man to do wickedly, neither hath he given any man licence to sin.
